00043 Entree& Distanceparoi::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00044 {
00045   if(Process::nproc()>1)
00046     {
00047       Cerr << " Distance_paroi : the calculation of the distance to the wall is made in sequential mode !! " << finl;
00048       exit();
00049     }
00050 
00051   int nb_paroi;
00052   Motcle format;
00053   associer_domaine(is);
00054   is >> nb_paroi;
00055 
00056   Noms nom_paroi(nb_paroi);
00057 
00058   for (int i=0; i< nb_paroi; i++) is >> nom_paroi[i];
00059 
00060   is >> format;
00061   if( (format != "binaire") && (format != "formatte"))
00062     {
00063       Cerr<<"Define the writing's format 'formatte' to write the file Wall_length.xyz"<<finl;
00064       Cerr<<"both in binary and ascii format, otherwise specify 'binaire'"<<finl;
00065       exit();
00066     }
00067 
00068 
00069   Domaine& dom=domaine();
00070   Nom fichier = dom.le_nom();
00071   fichier += "_Wall_length.xyz";
00072 
00073   Zone& la_zone=dom.zone(0);
00074 
00075   if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00076     Cerr << "In Distanceparoi::interpreter : Generate faces" << finl;
00077   Faces* les_faces_ptr=new(Faces);
00078   Faces& les_faces= *les_faces_ptr;
00079 
00080 // la_zone.creer_faces(les_faces);
00081 
00082   {
00083 // bloc a factoriser avec Zone_VF.cpp :
00084     Type_Face type_face = la_zone.type_elem().type_face(0);
00085     les_faces.typer(type_face);
00086     les_faces.associer_zone(la_zone);
00087 
00088     Static_Int_Lists connectivite_som_elem;
00089     const int     nb_sommets_tot = la_zone.domaine().nb_som_tot();
00090     const IntTab&    elements       = la_zone.les_elems();
00091 
00092     construire_connectivite_som_elem(nb_sommets_tot,
00093                                      elements,
00094                                      connectivite_som_elem,
00095                                      1 /* include virtual elements */);
00096 
00097     Faces_builder faces_builder;
00098     IntTab elem_faces; //!< Tableau dont on aura pas besoin
00099     faces_builder.creer_faces_reeles(la_zone,
00100                                      connectivite_som_elem,
00101                                      les_faces,
00102                                      elem_faces);
00103   }
00104   if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00105     Cerr << "In Distanceparoi::interpreter : Generate faces finished" << finl;
00106 
00107   DoubleTab xp;                                     //!< centres de gravite des elements
00108   DoubleTab xv;                                     //!< centres de gravite des faces
00109   const DoubleTab& xs=dom.coord_sommets();        //!< coordonnees des sommets
00110 
00111   les_faces.calculer_centres_gravite(xv);
00112   la_zone.calculer_centres_gravite(xp);
00113 
00114   int nb_elem_tot = xp.dimension(0);
00115   int dim = xv.dimension(1);
00116 
00117   DoubleVect wall_length(nb_elem_tot);
00118   wall_length=10e+15;
00119   DoubleVect dist_min(wall_length);
00120 
00121   ifstream fic1(fichier);
00122   if (fic1)
00123     {
00124       Cerr << " file " << fichier << " already exits : to generate a new one, this file has to be deleted" << finl;
00125       exit();
00126     }
00127   else
00128     {
00129       if (Process::je_suis_maitre())
00130         Cerr << " Generation of the external file named : " << fichier << finl;
00131 
00132       for (int b=0; b<nb_paroi; b++)
00133         {
00134           int rang=la_zone.rang_frontiere(nom_paroi[b]);
00135           const Frontiere& la_frontiere=la_zone.frontiere(rang);
00136 
00137 // pas de methode const pour Frontiere::les_sommets_des_faces();
00138           const IntTab& sommets_face = (ref_cast(Frontiere,la_frontiere)).les_sommets_des_faces();
00139 
00140           int ndeb = la_frontiere.num_premiere_face();
00141           int nb_faces = la_frontiere.nb_faces();
00142           int nfin = ndeb + nb_faces;
00143 
00144           int pourcent=0;
00145 
00146           for (int face=ndeb; face<nfin; face++)
00147             {
00148 
00149               if((((face-ndeb)*100)/nb_faces)>pourcent)
00150                 {
00151                   pourcent=((face-ndeb)*100)/nb_faces;
00152                   Cerr <<"\r"<<  pourcent << " % performs of " << nom_paroi[b] ;
00153                 }
00154 
00155               if (dim==2)
00156                 {
00157                   double compx_0=(xv(face,0));
00158                   double compy_0=(xv(face,1));
00159 
00160                   int som1=sommets_face(face-ndeb,0);
00161                   int som2=sommets_face(face-ndeb,1);
00162 
00163                   double nx=  xs(som1,1)-xs(som2,1);
00164                   double ny=-(xs(som1,0)-xs(som2,0));
00165 
00166                   double norme=sqrt(nx*nx+ny*ny);
00167                   if (norme==0)
00168                     {
00169                       Cerr << "Error in Distanceparoi::interpreter_" << finl;
00170                       Cerr << "Two nodes " << som1 << " and " << som2 << " seems to have same coordinates:" << finl;
00171                       Cerr << "xs(" << som1 << ")=" << xs(som1,0) <<" ys(" << som1 << ")= " << xs(som1,1) << finl;
00172                       Cerr << "xs(" << som2 << ")=" << xs(som2,0) <<" ys(" << som2 << ")= " << xs(som2,1) << finl;
00173                       Cerr << "Check your mesh and suppress same nodes or contact TRUST support." << finl;
00174                       exit();
00175                     }
00176 
00177                   if ( (la_zone.chercher_elements(compx_0+nx, compy_0+ny)) < 0 ) norme*=-1.;
00178 
00179                   nx/=norme;
00180                   ny/=norme;
00181 
00182 
00183                   for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_tot; num_elem++)
00184                     {
00185                       double min_loc=dist_min[num_elem];
00186 
00187                       double compx=(compx_0-xp(num_elem,0));
00188                       if (compx<min_loc)
00189                         {
00190                           double compy=(compy_0-xp(num_elem,1));
00191                           if (compy<min_loc)
00192                             {
00193 
00194                               double w_dist=sqrt(compx*compx+compy*compy);
00195 
00196                               if (w_dist<min_loc)
00197                                 {
00198                                   double compx_vect=compx*nx;
00199                                   double compy_vect=compy*ny;
00200 // double compz_vect=compz*nz;
00201 
00202                                   double w_distproj=sqrt(compx_vect*compx_vect+compy_vect*compy_vect);
00203                                   wall_length[num_elem]=w_distproj;
00204                                   dist_min[num_elem]=w_dist;
00205                                 }
00206 
00207                             }
00208                         }
00209                     }
00210                 }
00211 
00212               else if (dim==3)
00213                 {
00214                   double compx_0=(xv(face,0));
00215                   double compy_0=(xv(face,1));
00216                   double compz_0=(xv(face,2));
00217 
00218                   int som1=sommets_face(face-ndeb,0);
00219                   int som2=sommets_face(face-ndeb,1);
00220                   int som3=sommets_face(face-ndeb,2);
00221 
00222                   double x1= xs(som2,0)-xs(som1,0);
00223                   double y1= xs(som2,1)-xs(som1,1);
00224                   double z1= xs(som2,2)-xs(som1,2);
00225 
00226                   double x2= xs(som3,0)-xs(som1,0);
00227                   double y2= xs(som3,1)-xs(som1,1);
00228                   double z2= xs(som3,2)-xs(som1,2);
00229 
00230                   double nx= y1*z2 - z1*y2 ;
00231                   double ny= z1*x2 - x1*z2 ;
00232                   double nz= x1*y2 - y1*x2 ;
00233 
00234                   double norme=sqrt(nx*nx+ny*ny+nz*nz);
00235 
00236                   if ( (la_zone.chercher_elements(compx_0+nx, compy_0+ny, compz_0+nz)) < 0 ) norme*=-1.;
00237 
00238                   nx/=norme;
00239                   ny/=norme;
00240                   nz/=norme;
00241 
00242 
00243                   for (int num_elem=0; num_elem<nb_elem_tot; num_elem++)
00244                     {
00245                       double min_loc=dist_min[num_elem];
00246 
00247                       double compx=(compx_0-xp(num_elem,0));
00248                       if (compx<min_loc)
00249                         {
00250                           double compy=(compy_0-xp(num_elem,1));
00251                           if (compy<min_loc)
00252                             {
00253                               double compz=(compz_0-xp(num_elem,2));
00254                               if (compz<min_loc)
00255                                 {
00256 
00257                                   double w_dist=sqrt(compx*compx+compy*compy+compz*compz);
00258 
00259                                   if (w_dist<min_loc)
00260                                     {
00261                                       double compx_vect=compx*nx;
00262                                       double compy_vect=compy*ny;
00263                                       double compz_vect=compz*nz;
00264 
00265                                       double w_distproj=sqrt(compx_vect*compx_vect+compy_vect*compy_vect+compz_vect*compz_vect);
00266                                       wall_length[num_elem]=w_distproj;
00267                                       dist_min[num_elem]=w_dist;
00268                                     }
00269                                 }
00270                             }
00271                         }
00272                     }
00273                 }
00274               else
00275                 {
00276                   Cerr << "ERROR : Dimension 2 or 3 are required to calculate wall distance "<< finl;
00277                   exit();
00278                 }
00279             }//!< fin face
00280           Cerr<<finl;
00281         }//!< fin nb_paroi
00282     }//(!fic1)
00283 
00284   Cerr<<" Max distance"<< local_max_vect(dist_min)<<" "<< local_max_vect(wall_length)<<finl;
00285 
00286 
00287 
00288   SFichierBin fic_sauv(fichier);
00289 
00290   fic_sauv<<nom_paroi<<finl;
00291   int ntot=(nb_elem_tot*(1+Objet_U::dimension));
00292 // entete pour  pouvoir passer les blocs
00293 // fic_sauv<<1 <<finl<<ntot << finl<< (int)1 <<ntot<<finl<<ntot<<finl;
00294   fic_sauv << (int)1 <<ntot << (int)1 << ntot << finl << ntot << finl;
00295 // fic_sauv << (int)1 << ntot << (int)1 << ntot << ntot;
00296   for (int p=0; p<nb_elem_tot; p++)
00297     {
00298       fic_sauv<<xp(p,0)<<" "<<xp(p,1);
00299       if (Objet_U::dimension==3) fic_sauv<<" "<<xp(p,2);
00300       fic_sauv<<" "<<wall_length(p)<<finl;
00301     }
00302 
00303   fic_sauv << ntot << (int)0 << (int)0 << (int)0 << (int)1 << (int)0 << finl << ntot << finl << (int)1 << (int)0 << (int)0 <<finl;
00304 
00305   if (format=="formatte")
00306     {
00307       fichier = dom.le_nom();
00308       fichier += "_Wall_length_formatted.xyz";
00309       SFichier fic_sauv_format(fichier);
00310       fic_sauv_format<<nom_paroi<<finl;
00311       int ntot2=(nb_elem_tot*(1+Objet_U::dimension));
00312 // entete pour  pouvoir passer les blocs
00313       fic_sauv_format << (int)1 <<ntot2 << (int)1 << ntot2 << finl << ntot2 << finl;
00314       for (int p=0; p<nb_elem_tot; p++)
00315         {
00316           fic_sauv_format<<xp(p,0)<<" "<<xp(p,1);
00317           if (Objet_U::dimension==3) fic_sauv_format<<" "<<xp(p,2);
00318           fic_sauv_format<<" "<<wall_length(p)<<finl;
00319         }
00320       fic_sauv_format << ntot2 << (int)0 << (int)0 << (int)0 << (int)1 << (int)0 << finl << ntot2 << finl << (int)1 << (int)0 << (int)0 <<finl;
00321     }
00322 
00323   delete les_faces_ptr;
00324   return is;
00325 }
